[[Charlie Wheeler]] (daughter) | relationships = | actor = | }} '''Mr. Wheeler''' is the father of [[Charlie Wheeler]]. He is only mentioned in "[[The One Where Ross Is Fine]]" when his daughter tells her ex-boyfriend [[Joey Tribbiani]] and Joey's girlfriend-at-the-time [[Rachel Greene]] that he is a raging alcoholic, while having dinner with Charlie's boyfriend-at-the-time [[Ross Geller]] in his [[Ross' Third Apartment|apartment]]. ==Appearances== *"[[The One Where Ross Is Fine]]" (First mentioned) [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Unseen Characters]] [[Category:Males]] [[Category:Fathers]] [[Category:Characters]]
